Requirement: PQInterface version 2.22 and above!

Some select features: - Automatic boss dotting - Mind Sear hold - DoT Tracking System - DoT Power Tracking System - Full defensive cool-down support - Most advanced channel tick detection system around - Fully configurable and customizable through PQInterface
